title: Deadly Valentine
description: A missionary's wife and mother of three is found dead in her house on Valentine's Day. As authorities investigate, questions surrounding the murder hit close to home. Andrea Canning has chosen this episode as one of her most memorable classic episodes.
author: nbcnews.podcasts@gmail.com (NBC News)
